tool_description: Monitors product performance metrics against configurable thresholds and generates alerts for anomalies, underperformance, or exceptional results.

upper_thresholds.description: Upper threshold values for each metric

lower_thresholds.description: Lower threshold values for each metric

alert_severity.description: Alert level: low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Array length mismatch: metric_values and metric_names must have the same length.
Invalid threshold arrays: If provided, threshold arrays must match metric arrays in length.
Invalid alert severity: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
No thresholds specified: At least one of upper_thresholds or lower_thresholds must be provided.
Invalid threshold values: Threshold values must be numeric and upper thresholds must be greater than lower thresholds.
usage: Provide metric_values and metric_names arrays, specify upper_thresholds and/or lower_thresholds for monitoring, optionally set alert_severity. Returns alert status and triggered notifications.

alerts_triggered.description: List of triggered alerts with details
